articles.title: Mandatory footwear quality standards to come into force from Jul 1, curb sub-standard imports: BIS DG - ETRetail
articles.description: The QCO for 24 footwear and related products were notified in October 2020 and thereafter extension was given thrice before making it mandatory for large and medium-scale industries from next month.

articles.title: Jindal Steel & Power stock likely to double in 3 years: Kotak Institutional Equities - Economic Times
